node1.NPC_Response: Hi Annie. How's your day going?

node1.PC_Text: Hey Charlie! Fancy meeting you here.
node1.NPC_Response: Yes, Annie, always a pleasure to see you.

node1.PC_Text: His royal highness, King Charles of Acme Tech. How goes it, kind sir?
node1.NPC_Response: Oh, Annie, you silly goose. Such a joker…

A.PC_Text: It's going well!  Could you point me in the direction of the break room?
A.NPC_Response: Why, of course! I could use a coffee myself.

A.PC_Text: It's good but I can't find any notepads. Could I have one of yours?
A.NPC_Response: Of course! I would be happy to help.

A.PC_Text: Not good. I forgot my wallet at home this morning.
A.NPC_Response: I'm sorry to hear that.  Is there anything I can do?

B.NPC_Response: Just taking a stroll to stretch my legs.

B.PC_Text: I feel like I already have so much work to do!
B.NPC_Response: Yes, it can be a lot when you're new to a company.  You'll get caught up in no time!

B.PC_Text: Did you see the cake in the break room? Can you sneak in  and steal me a slice?
B.NPC_Response: Yes, it’s Luna's birthday! She always brings cake.   You are welcome to help yourself to some.

C.PC_Text: So, did you see the news that we have the afternoon off on Friday?
C.NPC_Response: I did! Such a treat. Do you have any nice plans.

C.PC_Text: I did go to juggling school.
I'm disappointed none of the other employees have asked me to go out after work? I can't understand why! I'm delightful!
C.NPC_Response: You certainly are. I am sure they will arrange something soon.

AA.PC_Text: I'm still figuring out my way around. Would you mind walking with me?
AA.NPC_Response: That's only natural.  I'd be delighted.

AA.PC_Text: Thanks! This place is like a maze.  And not the good kind where there's a prize at the end.
AA.NPC_Response: Oh, I see the lady likes puzzles!

AA.PC_Text: I don't drink coffee. Caffeine isn't good for you. You should really stick to herbal tea.
AA.NPC_Response: Well, thank you for your concern. I'll have to give that a try.

AB.PC_Text: Thanks so much! I like taking notes on paper.
AB.NPC_Response: I couldn't agree more. Computers can be so impersonal.

AB.PC_Text: Great! I'm so close to completing my collection. I just need a few more.
AB.NPC_Response: An avid collector, I see… It's always good to have hobbies.

AB.PC_Text: Thank you! I ran out at home and why spend money when office supplies are free?
AB.NPC_Response: Well, I won't tell if you won't!

AC.PC_Text: Would you mind lending me a few dollars so I can buy lunch?
AC.NPC_Response: Not at all. Please, it's on me! Consider it a welcome gift.

AC.PC_Text: Can you lend me $20? They're selling soft pretzels in the lobby and I want to bring some home!
AC.NPC_Response: Well, I don't know if I have that much but I would be happy to check.  I can't resist a good pretzel either!

AC.PC_Text: I need to borrow $100.  There's a one day sale at the mall and I want to run out at lunch and buy a new bag!
AC.NPC_Response: Oh,  I don't have that much money on me, I'm afraid. But I think the bag you have is lovely.

BA.PC_Text: Would you mind opening the door for me? I've got my hands full.
Can I join you? I could use a break too.
BA.NPC_Response: Your company would be most welcome.

BA.PC_Text: While you're strolling, can you walk past the break room and get me some chocolates?
BA.NPC_Response: Well, I wasn’t planning on walking that way but if the lady needs chocolate, she shall have it!

BB.PC_Text: Do you think you could show me how to fill in my company profile?
BB.NPC_Response: Of course! I'd be happy to help you out.

BB.PC_Text: Could you explain some of these projects to me so I don’t have to read all these files!
BB.NPC_Response: I think it might be helpful for you to read through them but who am I to refuse…

BB.PC_Text: Can you fill out these reports for me? You're familiar with them so you'll go such much faster!
BB.NPC_Response: It pains me to say it, but I think that's something you'll have to do on your own.

BC.PC_Text: Oh, great.  Thanks! Would you like me to bring you a piece?
BC.NPC_Response: How could I refuse such a sweet offer?

BC.PC_Text: I already took three slices! I just want another to take home!
BC.NPC_Response: Oh, well, I'm sure no one would mind. I can keep a secret!

BC.PC_Text: I'd really prefer if you got it for me. If someone else brings it to me then the calories don’t count.
BC.NPC_Response: Sorry to be the bearer of bad news, but I don't think that's true.

CA.PC_Text: No. I'm still looking for ideas. Could you  send me any recommendations you have in the area?
I'd like to go to the beach with some friends.  Would you be able to walk my dog for me?
CA.NPC_Response: Oh, I'd be happy to help you out.  Dogs are wonderful… they don’t call them man's best friend for nothing!

CA.PC_Text: I want to go to the Renaissance Fair and learn to make soap like in the 1500's! Can you go to my house and walk my dog? He only bites a little!
CA.NPC_Response: Oh, he sounds quite feisty! I'd love to meet the little fella but unfortunately I am busy!

CB.PC_Text: Could you hand me those three rubber band balls? I'll show you my latest act!
I went to juggling camp every summer.  Hand me those three rubber band balls!
You don't believe me? Go find me three balls and I will prove it.
CB.NPC_Response: I never said anything of the sort! I am sure you are a fine juggler.

CC.PC_Text: I'm sure you're right. I'd love to get to know the people here.
CC.NPC_Response: And you will… just be patient!

CC.PC_Text: What's taking them so long? Do you think you could  speak to them about arranging something?
CC.NPC_Response: Sure… I'll have a talk with them today.

CC.PC_Text: Can you just arrange it then? And  I want to go somewhere with fruity drinks with those little umbrellas!
CC.NPC_Response: I, um... Well, organizing is not my strong suit but I would be happy to mention it to the others for you.
